Action.author: dinotone
Action.body: From dialogue with Dongming and indirectly, Jim Zhang, this seems more about implementation, not a bug. The other alternative we discussed with Dongming was to remove the EventHub processing from PTE, and find some alternative non-PTE approaches to determine Invoke Move TPS. Removing EventHub is unfortunately non-trivial.

Action.author: dongming
Action.body: Per meeting with Dino and Jim etc, need to investigate performance based on per block vs per transaction event

Action.author: dinotone
Action.body: Eventhub processing continues to challenge our ability to drive consistent higher transaction rates into the HSBN env. We have alternative means to measure TPS (peerlog) which is more accurate then PTE.
